column2: 2018;"Last summer

column1: In Sweden
column2: we live our lives as if we had the resources of 4.2 planets. Our carbon footprint is one of the ten worst in the world. This means that Sweden steals 3.2 years of natural resources from future generations every year. Those of us who are part of these future generations would like Sweden to stop doing that.

column1: Right now.

They only care about what we actually do.
